segments.text: The sink is gushing water like a fountain gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle spreading across the floor is gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, soaking her shoes probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate, completely ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinets, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, climbing for cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are all crooked, ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the jar, grabbing treats secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, like she's part of the scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor's slippery now, someone will fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, window showing clean garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic disaster is turning my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
